faq.question: How do I debug Cocoon using JDK1.3+?

answer.p: With JDK1.3, set the TOMCAT_OPTS (for Tomcat 3.X) or CATALINA_OPTS (for Tomcat 4.X) as shown below (on Win2K) and then attach the debugger to localhost:8000 using "jdb -attach myhost:8000" More information can be found at JPDA - Connection and Invocation Details.
answer.note: This method is supposed to work under JBuilder4.0 as well.
